entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 late in the evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 March 2023
